targets.query:
from(bucket: "tefnut-$environement")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "humidity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "tefnut-$environement")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "state")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "tefnut-$environement")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "humidity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "target")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: last)

from(bucket: "tefnut-$environement")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mode" or r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, createEmpty: false, fn: last)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "tefnut-$environement")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "humidity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "delta")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: last)

from(bucket: "tefnut-$environement")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "timming")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "loop time")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: last)

from(bucket: "tefnut-$environement")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "humidity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "outdoor" or r["_field"] == "target" or r["_field"] == "state" or r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, createEmpty: false, fn: max)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "tefnut-$environement")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current temp" or r["_field"] == "forcast temp" or r["_field"] == "target temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, createEmpty: false, fn: max)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "tefnut-$environement")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "timming")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp delay" or r["_field"] == "humidity delay")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, createEmpty: false, fn: max)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "tefnut-$environement")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "timming")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "loop time")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, createEmpty: false, fn: max)
  |> yield(name: "max")
